job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing,Information Technology and Services,Mechanical or Industrial Engineering
job.description: SpaceX was founded under the belief that a future where humanity is out exploring the stars is fundamentally more exciting than one where we are not Today SpaceX is actively developing the technologies to make this possible with the ultimate goal of enabling human life on MarsbrbrstrongSITE RELIABILITY ENGINEERbrbrstrongSpaceX is looking for an experienced Site Reliability Engineer to operate and scale custombuilt missioncritical products for engineering test and launch We have no shortage of hard problems and challenges The ideal candidate will be flexible possess broad skills across product operations and software development and flourish in a fastpaced and challenging environment He or she should be a selfstarter selfmotivator and possess ingenuity to excel at this positionbrbrstrongRESPONSIBILITIESbrbrstrongul liDeploy upgrade operatemaintain and scale our suite of mission critical products and servicesli liClosely collaborate with Software Engineers to create highly operable and maintainable productsli liManage the underlying infrastructure in collaboration with IT Administratorsli liEngage in and improve the whole lifecycle of services  from inception and design through deployment operation and refinementli liPractice sustainable incident response and blameless postmortemsli liProvide enduser support to engineering for productsli brulstrongBASIC QUALIFICATIONSbrbrstrongul li3 years of Site Reliability Engineering or DevOps experienceli li3 years of Systems Administration experience with Windows and Linux operating systemsli liExperience with Puppet Ansible SCCM or other automation frameworksli liAutomation experience in Python PowerShell andor other languagesli liExperience with source code and version control tools such as Subversion or Gitli brulstrongPREFERRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCEbrbrstrongul liBachelors degree in computer science information systemsIT or engineeringli li5 years of Systems Administration Site Reliability Engineering or DevOps experienceli li3 years of experience with Microsoft System Center Configuration Managerli liStrong understanding of virtualization and hypervisor technologiesli liUnderstanding of databases and data modelingli liExperience with automatically managing dozens or hundreds of serversli liFocus on performance bottlenecks and performance improvement techniquesli liExperience with workflow and issue management tools such as JIRAli liStrong understanding of the OSI modelli liMust be comfortable working with mission critical and sensitive systems with a sense of urgency appropriate to the responsibilitiesli liExcellent communications skills with the ability to communicate with customers peers management etc in both formal and informal situationsli brulstrongITAR REQUIREMENTSbrbrstrongul liTo conform to US Government space technology export regulations including the International Traffic in Arms Regulations ITAR you must be a US citizen lawful permanent resident of the US protected individual as defined by 8 USC 1324ba3 or eligible to obtain the required authorizations from the US Department of State Learn more about the ITAR here li
